messages.message:
Key takeaways from the meeting to solve Letter of credits: @Ted @Hari @Karthik S @Jesika Haria @Aaron Vontell

Getting the complete list of documents from SC like(ex: bills of exchange, commercial invoice, etc)
Getting more sample docs
Finding out the success criteria
No OCR needed as all are docx files.
Using the list of docs as anchors to extract info

Here are the LoC documents shared by SC:
https://www.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/customers/sc/LOC/
(Problem Statement : We need to create the checklist file using the corresponding LoC(SWIFT message) document.)

Be awesome if we could maintain all of this in the table that lists current POCs. Even though it’s a post-sales POC, it’s nice to keep track of everything in one location: https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PROD/pages/22249543/POC+s+-+Inbound+Customer+Requests

You can create subpages so that we can track those details associated with this POC in a separate Confluence page
Yup! We need an IM way to send some links across, can help w keeping track of POCs there
You can also pull in pages dynamically from labels, so you don’t have to keep them all up to date :slightly_smiling_face:

You can also dynamically pull in Jira issues, so you could have a confluence page for each  PoC (each page with `active-poc` or something as a label), and then you could have similar labels for the jiras so those get pulled in if they aren’t complete (for example)
